intro: Welcome to an immersive journey through Kerala

transitions.message: Let's step inside this historic fort...
Now, let's see the ocean view from the fort...
Moving to the bustling fish market nearby...
Time to meet a renowned Theyyam performer...
Walking through the village streets...
Approaching the temple where Theyyam is performed...
Inside the sacred premises...
The preparations are beginning...
Watch as the Theyyam performance unfolds...
Another form of Theyyam begins...
The spectacular fire Theyyam...
A special performance loved by children...
One more enchanting performance...
The grand finale of Theyyam...
Let's explore the artisan village of Saragalaya...
Taking a complete tour of Saragalaya...
Moving to an art gallery in the heart of Kozhikode...
Now to Beypore, famous for its traditional ship building...
Climbing to the top of a freshly built Dhow...
Time for some Kalari Payattu, Kerala's martial art...
The final demonstration of Kalari mastery...

outro: Thank you for experiencing Kerala's rich cultural heritage
